function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variation in office workplace modification activities","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread due to inconsistent measures","Mitigation":"Standardize workplace modification plans and guidelines for all organizations","Technologies":"Digital platforms for sharing guidelines and best practices","People":"Employees, visitors, and the public","Owner":"Corporate real estate managers, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Low adoption of engineering control activities","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in the office environment","Mitigation":"Encourage and incentivize the adoption of engineering control activities (e.g. office re-configuration)","Technologies":"3D modeling software for office layout design, HVAC systems for air filtration","People":"Facility managers, office managers, corporate real estate managers","Owner":"Facility management, corporate leadership"},{"Description":"Uneven compliance with community measures","Impact":"Inconsistent application of risk management measures increases the likelihood of disease spread","Mitigation":"Enforce and monitor compliance with community measures through regular audits and reporting","Technologies":"Digital tracking and monitoring systems, remote temperature and health monitoring devices","People":"Employees, visitors, and the public","Owner":"Corporate leadership, public health agencies"}]}
